name: Emberville Auctions
description:
Solo project for the Epic Megajam 2022 "As Above So Below"

You play a recently deceased Real Estate Agent, who has been given a second shot in the depths of HECK doing what he does best!

Flip houses, turn a profit and rule at the Auction!

I got this submission in with a mere 13 minutes left on the clock, as such theres things unfinished, I will update it to what I hoped to achieved as a side gig in the coming weeks :)
